roleset.name: to try a lawsuit in advance

example.name: No arg1
example.text: Energy Transportation retained Litigation Sciences , at a cost of several hundred thousand dollars , whnp to poll , pre-try , profile and shadow .

example.name: All args
example.text: The concept gave him the idea of having lawyers pre-try cases before online juries.

roleset.note: PRETRY-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to try.02. (from pretry.01-v)
